name: Fantasy XCOM
description:
On the horizon you feel the presence of a powerful being, one that could dethrone you as the most evil of masterminds in this part of the kingdom, fortunately your dungeon is filled with fresh corpses and equipment of adventurers, its time to create the perfect adventuring party to destroy this looming threat to your ego.

Controls:
T - Start fight/End turn
1 to 0 - select action
Space - force move (for when you don't want to use AOE actions)
Shift - show min/max action range
Mouse - everything else
F11 - fullscreen
